snippet.title: Reflectile – Kickstarter Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Reflectile on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/pngsequence/reflectile-a-precision-puzzle-game
Reflectile on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2389610/Reflectile/

Reflectile is a minimal precision-puzzle game that yearns for the early 2000's era of video games. It will test your ability to cut corners, squeeze through tight corridors, and make split-second inputs to reach the goal of each stage.

#gaming #indiegames 
Best Upcoming Indie Game Trailers
